name: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
desc: Identifiers for specific facial features, for use with coefficients describing the relative movements of those features.

items.name: static let eyeBlinkLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing closure of the eyelids over the left eye.

items.name: static let eyeLookDownLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing movement of the left eyelids consistent with a downward gaze.

items.name: static let eyeLookInLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing movement of the left eyelids consistent with a rightward gaze.

items.name: static let eyeLookOutLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing movement of the left eyelids consistent with a leftward gaze.

items.name: static let eyeLookUpLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing movement of the left eyelids consistent with an upward gaze.

items.name: static let eyeSquintLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing contraction of the face around the left eye.

items.name: static let eyeWideLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing a widening of the eyelids around the left eye.

items.name: static let eyeBlinkRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing closure of the eyelids over the right eye.

items.name: static let eyeLookDownRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing movement of the right eyelids consistent with a downward gaze.

items.name: static let eyeLookInRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing movement of the right eyelids consistent with a leftward gaze.

items.name: static let eyeLookOutRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing movement of the right eyelids consistent with a rightward gaze.

items.name: static let eyeLookUpRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing movement of the right eyelids consistent with an upward gaze.

items.name: static let eyeSquintRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing contraction of the face around the right eye.

items.name: static let eyeWideRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing a widening of the eyelids around the right eye.

items.name: static let jawForward: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing forward movement of the lower jaw.

items.name: static let jawLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing leftward movement of the lower jaw.

items.name: static let jawRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing rightward movement of the lower jaw.

items.name: static let jawOpen: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing an opening of the lower jaw.

items.name: static let mouthClose: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing closure of the lips independent of jaw position.

items.name: static let mouthFunnel: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing contraction of both lips into an open shape.

items.name: static let mouthPucker: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing contraction and compression of both closed lips.

items.name: static let mouthLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing leftward movement of both lips together.

items.name: static let mouthRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing rightward movement of both lips together.

items.name: static let mouthSmileLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward movement of the left corner of the mouth.

items.name: static let mouthSmileRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward movement of the right corner of the mouth.

items.name: static let mouthFrownLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing downward movement of the left corner of the mouth.

items.name: static let mouthFrownRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing downward movement of the right corner of the mouth.

items.name: static let mouthDimpleLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing backward movement of the left corner of the mouth.

items.name: static let mouthDimpleRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing backward movement of the right corner of the mouth.

items.name: static let mouthStretchLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing leftward movement of the left corner of the mouth.

items.name: static let mouthStretchRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing rightward movement of the left corner of the mouth.

items.name: static let mouthRollLower: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing movement of the lower lip toward the inside of the mouth.

items.name: static let mouthRollUpper: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing movement of the upper lip toward the inside of the mouth.

items.name: static let mouthShrugLower: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing outward movement of the lower lip.

items.name: static let mouthShrugUpper: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing outward movement of the upper lip.

items.name: static let mouthPressLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward compression of the lower lip on the left side.

items.name: static let mouthPressRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward compression of the lower lip on the right side.

items.name: static let mouthLowerDownLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing downward movement of the lower lip on the left side.

items.name: static let mouthLowerDownRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing downward movement of the lower lip on the right side.

items.name: static let mouthUpperUpLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward movement of the upper lip on the left side.

items.name: static let mouthUpperUpRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward movement of the upper lip on the right side.

items.name: static let browDownLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing downward movement of the outer portion of the left eyebrow.

items.name: static let browDownRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing downward movement of the outer portion of the right eyebrow.

items.name: static let browInnerUp: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward movement of the inner portion of both eyebrows.

items.name: static let browOuterUpLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward movement of the outer portion of the left eyebrow.

items.name: static let browOuterUpRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward movement of the outer portion of the right eyebrow.

items.name: static let cheekPuff: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing outward movement of both cheeks.

items.name: static let cheekSquintLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward movement of the cheek around and below the left eye.

items.name: static let cheekSquintRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing upward movement of the cheek around and below the right eye.

items.name: static let noseSneerLeft: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing a raising of the left side of the nose around the nostril.

items.name: static let noseSneerRight: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing a raising of the right side of the nose around the nostril.

items.name: static let tongueOut: ARFaceAnchor.BlendShapeLocation
items.desc: The coefficient describing extension of the tongue.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a blend shape location.
